des:
Would you like to control your gadgets at home by voice? Lenovo Smart Home helps you open the door to a smart life.

To get started, download the Lenovo Link app from the app store. First sign in with your Lenovo ID, or create a Lenovo ID from within the app to use for sign in. Then tap “Add device” in Lenovo Link to discover and link Lenovo Smart Home gadgets. Give a unique name to each gadget, such as “kitchen light” or “fan”.

You can then enable the Lenovo Smart Home skill to control these devices.

With only a few steps, you get the access to the future. Download Lenovo Link from the app store and give it a try.
